title: Shock Video Of What’s Coming Next If We Don’t Stand Up (Ep 1661)
description:
Disturbing video out of the UK showing what’s next if we don’t stop the covid mandate hysteria. I also address a ridiculous speech on the House floor by a member of the squad, which proves the left is bedrocked in dishonesty. 

News Picks:


Twitter does it again, as they add a ridiculous label to a scientific study about vaccines.

Groups are learning how to pressure colleges into supporting free speech. 

IRS data proves that conservatives have been right the entire time about the Trump tax cuts.


Leftist speech censors have opened up a new front in their war on freedom.


Latinx is NOT a thing.
